body: I mean, Ranma and Akane are engaged. I imagine when their relationship finally turned sexual, Akane would be totally into fucking both of Ranma's forms, if only for the novelty of having a singular partner she can be bi for. As for Ranma, scissoring seems like less of a stretch from his comfort zone than Akane pegging him, though it might get to that.
So glad to see Ranma yuri still being produced...
